column1: Screen reader users: There is 1 table on this tab called Table 35: Unadjusted 3-month and 1-, 3-, 5- and 10-year graft survival rates in pediatric kidney transplant recipients by type of donor, first graft, Canada (excluding Quebec), 2010 to 2021 (percentage). Table 35  Unadjusted 3-month and 1-, 3-, 5- and 10-year graft survival rates in pediatric kidney transplant recipients by type of donor, first graft, Canada (excluding Quebec), 2010 to 2021 (percentage)
Data from Quebec was excluded from this table because of significant under-reporting of transplant data between 2012 and 2021.
Canadian Organ Replacement Register, 2022, Canadian Institute for Health Information.
